title: First Steps in Letterpress
content: My beginner's book for people interested in starting letterpress printing at home now has it's own website, with excerpts and international ordering details: [http://j.mp/11BgihY](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822231710/http:/j.mp/11BgihY "http://j.mp/11BgihY")
author: MetalType

comments.content:
Two URL shortners? Seriously?

Here's the direct link - [http://www.metaltype.co.uk/steps](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822231710/http:/www.metaltype.co.uk/steps "http://www.metaltype.co.uk/steps")
Thanks for sharing, though i wish you would show a sample chapter or something.
